message: Writer of "High Performance Web sites" and "Even faster websites"

name: Steve Souders - High Performance Web Sites

description: Two performance best practices are to add a far future expiration date and to delay loading resources (esp. scripts) until after the onload event. But it turns out that the combination of these best practices leads to a situation where itâ€™s hard for users to refresh resources. More specifically, hit...
